document_data.name: Skrut
document_data.mainbody: '''Skrut''' was a [[goblin]] boss who led his kind in the [[cult of the Absolute]], within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had yellow-green skin and long brown hair he wore back, with small braids in front of his ears.
document_data.Personality: Skrut was not particularly fond of the ''[[scrying eye]]''s that cult leaders at [[Moonrise Towers]] kept in the Shattered Sanctum.
document_data.Possessions: The goblin boss wielded a vicious-looking goblin [[scimitar]]. He wore a set of goblin-made [[plate armor]] that was decorated with various bones and skulls.
